articles.title: Millions of Americans face below-zero temperatures as storms bring blast of Arctic air, snow and ice - The Associated Press
articles.description: Subfreezing temperatures blasting much of the U.S. have put millions of Americans at risk of potentially dangerous cold as winter storms continue to dump snow from coast to coast. The National Weather Service said Sunday that wind chills could plummet as low …
articles.content: Subfreezing temperatures across much of the U.S. left millions of Americans facing dangerous cold as Arctic storms knocked out electricity to tens of thousands in the Northwest, brought snow to the S… [+7442 chars]

articles.author: Alicia Adamczyk
articles.title: High-net worth families are racing against the clock to shield their wealth before the estate tax increases - Fortune
articles.description: The estate tax exemption could be halved in 2026. The wealthiest Americans are taking note.
articles.content: The wealthiest people in the U.S. could see major tax hikes after next year, sending high-net worth clients to financial planning offices around the country to try to get around them, their money man… [+4113 chars]

articles.title: This Week In Space podcast: Episode 93 — Does America really want to go back to the moon? - Space.com
articles.description: Former NASA Chief Historian Roger Launius reveals the history of America's dedication to moon exploration and what it means today.
